Articles.Content:
After the failed rescue of the passengers in the shot down commercial craft, we spot something being built at the launch site on Jeb's island. We should send in the best to investigate!

I'm not going to spam the previous videos and annoy everyone. If you liked this one I'm sure you'll find the others.

Hi all,

I'm working on a series of videos revolving around a war that has started on Kerbin. Currently the war is small and localized but will slowly spread around the globe. I'm currently using BD Armory as the main mod for the videos and would love to hear some of your opinions on how to proceed. Please take a look at the playlist below and tell me what you think.
